title: 20 great wild walks for summer
text:
Christopher Somerville Published 1 minute ago 
A stroll in the park after Sunday lunch is all very well, but sometimes we need a bigger challenge. Over the next week, The Times will help you to discover the wilder side of Britain. Starting today and continuing on Monday, we have a guide to the 100 best wild places to go. You can discover the best wild places to stay, from tree houses to remote hotels. We’ll give you our pick of the best wild beaches, from plunge pools in Cornwall to secret coves and caves. There will be a guide to culture in the wild — from plays Subscribe now
